div.pre: 1052 Cherronesus (near mod. Sevastopol'), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1895 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 47 AE Cherronesus: AE, (as BMC 5 [25]; Zograph, pl. 35, 16 [4]) Disposition: Sevastopol' 26 OAK 1895 (publ. 1897), pp. 77, 196-7 â€ Gilevich, SA 1960, no. 4, pp. 167-70
